creator: Language Drops
descriptionHtml:
What if 🇹🇭 Thai vocabulary learning was a crazy fun game instead of the usual, boring memorization methods? Drops makes process of learning Thai possible with language learning app that is effortless and fun. Practical Thai vocabulary is inserted to your memory through attractive graphics and fast mini-games.

The weird part? It only takes 5 minutes a day. It might sound crazy but works like a charm! :)


👀 100% illustrated: Images directly carry the meaning – there’s no need for you to use your native language at all – use pictures to learn Thai! There’s nothing in the middle.This way everything is faster and more effective, and of course more fun! :)

🏎 5 min sessions: Limited practice time sounds insane but it’s what certainly makes it addictive – which is a good effect if you are learning something. You’ll have close to zero reasons not to learn Thai vocabulary since you only need 5 minutes per day.

🕹 Effortless play: We know why games are addictive and fun, and we used that knowledge when we created Drops. This resulted in a truly immersive experience, that is definitely not a waste of your time: while you're playing, you're also building a valuable stock of knowledge of Thai language.

⚡Quick: Keyboard typing is slow. So say hello to simple taps and fast swipes! Trust us, you’ll need those extra seconds during the fast Thai learning sessions ;)

🎯 Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just pure, handpicked practical Thai words that matter. That’s our focus here and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an addict to language learning. However, effectiveness is still quite useless without a good established habit. But don't worry, we will help you build that habit too – for maximum efficiency in language learning.

We are truly proud of our beautiful word pronunciations from our professional voice talents!

Drops is free for casual learners: With more than 1700 words in 99 topics to learn from. Hardcore language learners can opt-in for premium plans for as low as $2.99 to progress faster and with unlimited learning time.

🌍 So what’s our goal here? Our goal is to empower everyone in the world through language knowledge by giving a special tool that uses the universal language that everyone can speak: pictures. Learn Thai. Speak Thai.

P.S. Drops can really get you addicted to language learning. You’ve been warned! ;)
________________________________________
😍 If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com
descriptionShort: Study Thai vocabulary and master Thai language with this visual learning app

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Japanese and Korean have hundreds of new words! We’ve expanded the languages to include language-specific content. You can now learn the names of iconic dishes from Japan or Korea, onomatopoeic expressions, and other vocabulary related to Korean culture and Japanese culture.
Learning Farsi? You can now play your way to 2,500+ words in more than 150 topics with Drops.

Practical Thai vocabulary is inserted to your memory through attractive graphics and fast mini-games.

The weird part? It only takes 5 minutes a day. It might sound crazy but works like a charm! :)


👀 100% illustrated: Images directly carry the meaning – there’s no need for you to use your native language at all – use pictures to learn Thai! There’s nothing in the middle.This way everything is faster and more effective, and of course more fun! :)

🏎 5 min sessions: Limited practice time sounds insane but it’s what certainly makes it addictive – which is a good effect if you are learning something. You’ll have close to zero reasons not to learn Thai vocabulary since you only need 5 minutes per day.

🕹 Effortless play: We know why games are addictive and fun, and we used that knowledge when we created Drops. This resulted in a truly immersive experience, that is definitely not a waste of your time: while you're playing, you're also building a valuable stock of knowledge of Thai language.

⚡Quick: Keyboard typing is slow. So say hello to simple taps and fast swipes! Trust us, you’ll need those extra seconds during the fast Thai learning sessions ;)

🎯 Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just pure, handpicked practical Thai words that matter. That’s our focus here and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an addict to language learning. However, effectiveness is still quite useless without a good established habit. But don't worry, we will help you build that habit too – for maximum efficiency in language learning.

We are truly proud of our beautiful word pronunciations from our professional voice talents!

Drops is free for casual learners: With more than 1700 words in 99 topics to learn from. Hardcore language learners can opt-in for premium plans for as low as $2.99 to progress faster and with unlimited learning time.

🌍 So what’s our goal here? Our goal is to empower everyone in the world through language knowledge by giving a special tool that uses the universal language that everyone can speak: pictures. Learn Thai. Speak Thai.

P.S. Drops can really get you addicted to language learning. You’ve been warned! ;)
________________________________________
😍 If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

The weird part? It only takes 5 minutes a day. It might sound crazy but works like a charm! :)


👀 100% illustrated: Images directly carry the meaning – there’s no need for you to use your native language at all – use pictures to learn Thai! There’s nothing in the middle.This way everything is faster and more effective, and of course more fun! :)

🏎 5 min sessions: Limited practice time sounds insane but it’s what certainly makes it addictive – which is a good effect if you are learning something. You’ll have close to zero reasons not to learn Thai vocabulary since you only need 5 minutes per day.

🕹 Effortless play: We know why games are addictive and fun, and we used that knowledge when we created Drops. This resulted in a truly immersive experience, that is definitely not a waste of your time: while you're playing, you're also building a valuable stock of knowledge of Thai language.

⚡Quick: Keyboard typing is slow. So say hello to simple taps and fast swipes! Trust us, you’ll need those extra seconds during the fast Thai learning sessions ;)

🎯 Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just pure, handpicked practical Thai words that matter. That’s our focus here and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an addict to language learning. However, effectiveness is still quite useless without a good established habit. But don't worry, we will help you build that habit too – for maximum efficiency in language learning.

We are truly proud of our beautiful word pronunciations from our professional voice talents!

Drops is free for casual learners: With more than 1700 words in 99 topics to learn from. Hardcore language learners can opt-in for premium plans for as low as $2.99 to progress faster and with unlimited learning time.

🌍 So what’s our goal here? Our goal is to empower everyone in the world through language knowledge by giving a special tool that uses the universal language that everyone can speak: pictures. Learn Thai. Speak Thai.

P.S. Drops can really get you addicted to language learning. You’ve been warned! ;)
________________________________________
😍 If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :) Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

🕹 Effortless play: We know why games are addictive and fun, and we used that knowledge when we created Drops. This resulted in a truly immersive experience, that is definitely not a waste of your time: while you're playing, you're also building a valuable stock of knowledge of Thai language.

⚡Quick: Keyboard typing is slow. So say hello to simple taps and fast swipes! Trust us, you’ll need those extra seconds during the fast Thai learning sessions ;)

🎯 Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just pure, handpicked practical Thai words that matter. That’s our focus here and we are very good at it.

👀 100% illustrated: Images directly carry the meaning – there’s no need for you to use your native language at all – use pictures to learn Thai! There’s nothing in the middle.This way everything is faster and more effective, and of course more fun! :)

🏎 5 min sessions: Limited practice time sounds insane but it’s what certainly makes it addictive – which is a good effect if you are learning something. You’ll have close to zero reasons not to learn Thai vocabulary since you only need 5 minutes per day.

🕹 Effortless play: We know why games are addictive and fun, and we used that knowledge when we created Drops. This resulted in a truly immersive experience, that is definitely not a waste of your time: while you're playing, you're also building a valuable stock of knowledge of Thai language.

⚡Quick: Keyboard typing is slow. So say hello to simple taps and fast swipes! Trust us, you’ll need those extra seconds during the fast Thai learning sessions ;)

🎯 Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just pure, handpicked practical Thai words that matter. That’s our focus here and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an addict to language learning. However, effectiveness is still quite useless without a good established habit. But don't worry, we will help you build that habit too – for maximum efficiency in language learning.

We are truly proud of our beautiful word pronunciations from our professional voice talents!

👀 100% illustrated: Images directly carry the meaning – there’s no need for you to use your native language at all – use pictures to learn Thai! There’s nothing in the middle.This way everything is faster and more effective, and of course more fun! :)

🏎 5 min sessions: Limited practice time sounds insane but it’s what certainly makes it addictive – which is a good effect if you are learning something. You’ll have close to zero reasons not to learn Thai vocabulary since you only need 5 minutes per day.

🕹 Effortless play: We know why games are addictive and fun, and we used that knowledge when we created Drops. This resulted in a truly immersive experience, that is definitely not a waste of your time: while you're playing, you're also building a valuable stock of knowledge of Thai language.

⚡Quick: Keyboard typing is slow. So say hello to simple taps and fast swipes! Trust us, you’ll need those extra seconds during the fast Thai learning sessions ;)

🎯 Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just pure, handpicked practical Thai words that matter. That’s our focus here and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an addict to language learning. However, effectiveness is still quite useless without a good established habit. But don't worry, we will help you build that habit too – for maximum efficiency in language learning.

We are truly proud of our beautiful word pronunciations from our professional voice talents!

🏎 5 min sessions: Limited practice time sounds insane but it’s what certainly makes it addictive – which is a good effect if you are learning something. You’ll have close to zero reasons not to learn Thai vocabulary since you only need 5 minutes per day.

👀 100% illustrated: Images directly carry the meaning – there’s no need for you to use your native language at all – use pictures to learn Thai! There’s nothing in the middle.This way everything is faster and more effective, and of course more fun! :)

🏎 5 min sessions: Limited practice time sounds insane but it’s what certainly makes it addictive – which is a good effect if you are learning something. You’ll have close to zero reasons not to learn Thai vocabulary since you only need 5 minutes per day.

🕹 Effortless play: We know why games are addictive and fun, and we used that knowledge when we created Drops. This resulted in a truly immersive experience, that is definitely not a waste of your time: while you're playing, you're also building a valuable stock of knowledge of Thai language.

⚡Quick: Keyboard typing is slow. So say hello to simple taps and fast swipes! Trust us, you’ll need those extra seconds during the fast Thai learning sessions ;)

🎯 Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just pure, handpicked practical Thai words that matter. That’s our focus here and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an addict to language learning. However, effectiveness is still quite useless without a good established habit. But don't worry, we will help you build that habit too – for maximum efficiency in language learning.

Practical Thai vocabulary is inserted to your memory through attractive graphics and fast mini-games.

The weird part? It only takes 5 minutes a day. It might sound crazy but works like a charm! :)


👀 100% illustrated: Images directly carry the meaning – there’s no need for you to use your native language at all – use pictures to learn Thai! There’s nothing in the middle.This way everything is faster and more effective, and of course more fun! :)

🏎 5 min sessions: Limited practice time sounds insane but it’s what certainly makes it addictive – which is a good effect if you are learning something. You’ll have close to zero reasons not to learn Thai vocabulary since you only need 5 minutes per day.

🕹 Effortless play: We know why games are addictive and fun, and we used that knowledge when we created Drops. This resulted in a truly immersive experience, that is definitely not a waste of your time: while you're playing, you're also building a valuable stock of knowledge of Thai language.

⚡Quick: Keyboard typing is slow. So say hello to simple taps and fast swipes! Trust us, you’ll need those extra seconds during the fast Thai learning sessions ;)

🎯 Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just pure, handpicked practical Thai words that matter. That’s our focus here and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an addict to language learning. However, effectiveness is still quite useless without a good established habit. But don't worry, we will help you build that habit too – for maximum efficiency in language learning.

We are truly proud of our beautiful word pronunciations from our professional voice talents!

Drops is free for casual learners: With more than 1700 words in 99 topics to learn from. Hardcore language learners can opt-in for premium plans for as low as $2.99 to progress faster and with unlimited learning time.

🌍 So what’s our goal here? Our goal is to empower everyone in the world through language knowledge by giving a special tool that uses the universal language that everyone can speak: pictures. Learn Thai. Speak Thai.

P.S. Drops can really get you addicted to language learning. You’ve been warned! ;)

The weird part? It only takes 5 minutes a day. It might sound crazy but works like a charm! :)


👀 100% illustrated: Images directly carry the meaning – there’s no need for you to use your native language at all – use pictures to learn Thai! There’s nothing in the middle.This way everything is faster and more effective, and of course more fun! :)

🏎 5 min sessions: Limited practice time sounds insane but it’s what certainly makes it addictive – which is a good effect if you are learning something. You’ll have close to zero reasons not to learn Thai vocabulary since you only need 5 minutes per day.

🕹 Effortless play: We know why games are addictive and fun, and we used that knowledge when we created Drops. This resulted in a truly immersive experience, that is definitely not a waste of your time: while you're playing, you're also building a valuable stock of knowledge of Thai language.

⚡Quick: Keyboard typing is slow. So say hello to simple taps and fast swipes! Trust us, you’ll need those extra seconds during the fast Thai learning sessions ;)

🎯 Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just pure, handpicked practical Thai words that matter. That’s our focus here and we are very good at it.

💁Forge a habit: Drops wants to turn you into an addict to language learning. However, effectiveness is still quite useless without a good established habit. But don't worry, we will help you build that habit too – for maximum efficiency in language learning.

We are truly proud of our beautiful word pronunciations from our professional voice talents!

Drops is free for casual learners: With more than 1700 words in 99 topics to learn from. Hardcore language learners can opt-in for premium plans for as low as $2.99 to progress faster and with unlimited learning time.

🌍 So what’s our goal here? Our goal is to empower everyone in the world through language knowledge by giving a special tool that uses the universal language that everyone can speak: pictures. Learn Thai. Speak Thai.

P.S. Drops can really get you addicted to language learning. You’ve been warned! ;)
